level.heading: Records and inventories of registrants.
level.text: Persons registered to manufacture, distribute, or dispense controlled substances under this chapter shall keep records and maintain inventories in conformance with the record-keeping and inventory requirements of federal law, laws of the District of Columbia, and with any additional rules which the Mayor issues.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 48-903.08.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-29
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-29, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 48-901.02.
